com.itworks.snamp.connectors.util

Class NotificationUtils.SynchronizationListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itworks.snamp.connectors.notifications.NotificationUtils.SynchronizationListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    NotificationUtils

    public static final class NotificationUtils.SynchronizationListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements NotificationListener
    Represents notification listener that can be used to handle the notification synchronously. This class cannot be inherited.

    The following example demonstrates how to use this class: 

    final SynchronizationListener listener = new SynchronizationListener();
     final Object listenerId = connector.subscribe("subs-list", listener);
     listener.getAwaitor().await(); //blocks the caller thread
     connector.unsubscribe(listenerId);

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno
